item.title: Randy Pausch Last Lecture: Achieving Your Childhood Dreams
item.description: Content requires Javascript to be enabled. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ji5_MqicxSo p.noscript{ background-color: #fefea0; border-left: 4px solid #fea0a0; padding: 0 0.25em; } Youtube - Randy Pausch Last Lecture | Achieving Your Childhood Dreams

item.title: IPL 3 on YouTube
item.description: If you have Airtel broadband + unlimited bandwidth then you are lucky to enjoy IPL without commercials. YouTube IPL channel can be viewed with 2Mbps speed without any extra cost.

item.title: Play YouTube with FLV player of your choice
item.description: Not working anymore, but you are free to explore the code. Updates are welcome. I have completed alternative way to view YouTube videos with FLV player of your choice (JW FLV player in this case).
